triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Gemma is a family of large language models that the paper introduces as novel open models.

triples.name: Natural language understanding
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates Gemma models on language understanding benchmarks as a key performance metric.

triples.name: Automated reasoning
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates Gemma models on reasoning tasks across academic benchmarks.

triples.name: AI safety
triples.relevance: The paper presents comprehensive evaluations of safety and responsibility aspects of the Gemma models.

triples.name: Benchmark (computing)
triples.relevance: The paper uses academic benchmarks to evaluate and compare Gemma models against similarly-sized open models.

triples.name: Gemini (language model)
triples.relevance: Gemma is built from research and technology used to create Gemini models, serving as the foundation.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Gemma models are built using deep learning techniques fundamental to modern large language models.
